mapper.select: select imagecode, imagename, imagerealpath, imagerealname, usename, userid from images
select imagecode, imagename, imagerealpath, imagerealname, usename, userid from images where imagecode = #{imageCode}
mapper.update: update images set imageName = nvl(#{imageName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},imagename) ,imagerealpath = nvl(#{imageRealpath, jdbcType=VARCHAR},imagerealpath) ,imagerealname = nvl(#{imageRealname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},imagerealname) where imagecode = #{imageCode}
